title: Petra placing shares for minerals explorer Orion
text:
Stockbroker Petra Capital was seeking buyers for minerals explorer Orion Minerals on Tuesday morning.

The broker was offering new shares at 2.5¢ each to raise $5 million via a single tranche placement.

Orion Minerals shares were in a trading halt on Tuesday. Peter Braig

The deal was priced at a 7.4 per cent discount to the last close and an 18.6 per cent discount to the 30 day VWAP, according to terms sent to potential investors.

Funds raised were to complete optimisation studies, early stage works at its Prieska project, exploration and working capital.

Petra was calling for bids by 3pm on Wednesday, the term sheet said.
